All Known Subinterfaces:

extends JAXRSService

    • listRecentExecutions

      @GET @Path("executions/recent") @Produces({"application/json","application/yaml","application/xml"}) java.util.List<org.apache.syncope.common.lib.to.ExecTO> listRecentExecutions​(@Min(1L) @QueryParam("max") @DefaultValue("25") @javax.validation.constraints.Min(1L) int max)
